title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly constant from 1984 to 1986, gradually increasing from 1986 to 1987, roughly constant from 1987 to 1991, gradually decreasing from 1991 to 1993, gradually increasing from 1993 to 1994, roughly constant from 1994 to 1995, gradually decreasing from 1995 to 1996, slightly constant from 1996 to 2000, slightly decreasing from 2000 to 2001, gradually increasing from 2001 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, gradually increasing from 2003 to 2004, gradually decreasing from 2004 to 2005, rapidly increasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, gradually increasing from 2007 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2010, gradually decreasing from 2010 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, slightly constant from 2014 to 2016, rapidly increasing from 2016 to 2018, and lastly gradually constant from 2018 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1995 and 1996.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 8.6 was recorded at Year 1984
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 1.95 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2001 to 2008.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2018 to 2024.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1995 to 2001.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 1984 to 1990.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2018.
But, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 1990 to 1995.
